name: V R Cubes
description:
V R Cubes

A dumb, weird multiplayer VR toy. V R all cubes, V can move around, and V can set R own textures by pasting in URLs. That's pretty much it.

Invite friends to join you in The Metaverse by sending them this URL: okaybenji.itch.io/v-r-cubes

On Mobile? Play at okaybenji.github.io/v-r-cubes instead.

NOTE: Use image URLs which begin with https.

Why?

¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Thx
  • Mozilla VR for A-Frame
  • Ricardo Cabello for three.js
  • Kevin Ngo for the Metaverse scene
  • Mayo Tobita & gtk2k for the A-Frame GIF Shader

Thank you!
